summary: Adds 2 new followers, Gotrek and Felix to the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod. It adds followers Gotrek and Felix (from warhammer) to the Bannered Mare in Whiterun.
They are NOT identical to the Warhammer Version.
This being my first attempt at modding I wanted to start off small and go from there. So I made this mod to my own preferences for Skyrim.

To add Gotrek\'s eyepatch download Immersive Armors by Hothtrooper44 and use the Seadog Eyepatch. It is not included in this file, I don\'t have permission from Hothtrooper44 because I haven\'t asked!

Constructive criticism welcome. I hope you like it :D

You can also download this from Steam: http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=176020818

CREDITS:
Bethesda for Skyrim and the C.K
Games Workshop, Black Library, William King and Nathan Long for Gotrek & Felix

Permissions: 
If you feel you can make this mod better (proper armour, weapons etc) feel free to edit it any way you see fit, but please credit me for the original. :)
author: Kais1980
